bug.author: pangbochen
bug.summary: Tensorboard 0.0.0.0:6006 cannot work On Win7 but localhost:6006 works
bug.description:
I use tensorboard on Win7. Everyting works fine and the cmd shows "Starting TensorBoard b'47' at <denchmark-link:http://0.0.0.0:6006>http://0.0.0.0:6006</denchmark-link>
" But when I input "<denchmark-link:http://0.0.0.0:6006>http://0.0.0.0:6006</denchmark-link> " into chrome, nothing happens. I google for it but find limited answer. Then I input "<denchmark-link:http://localhost:6006>http://localhost:6006</denchmark-link> " into chrome, the page comes out.

comments.comment: Can you give the full output?
Now I have same problem.. how to resolve this problem?

me too. I use 127.0.0.1:6006 to load logs. It works. I use tensorboard --logdir=logs --debug. It prints nothing. Does it have no authority? <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/23494598/25580600/e4b9e3ca-2eb4-11e7-9273-6f7a464bbd1c.jpg></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/23494598/25580601/e546978e-2eb4-11e7-8ebf-f6b80e2a1937.jpg></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/23494598/25580605/e7b2ab48-2eb4-11e7-9818-7c8791dc674b.jpg></denchmark-link>
Mark! The same question, and i run tensorboard on the cloud and it has to show on my desktop because of the lack of GUI of Cloud!
I have the exact same problem! Does anyone has a solution for this problem?
